## Erc20.get() method

Get the token Metadata (name, symbol, etc...)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(): Promise<Currency>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Currency](./sdk.currency.md)<!-- -->&gt;

The token metadata

## Example


```javascript
const token = await contract.token.get();
```
